divs: Sighting Details1. Outside, enjoying a bonfire with four other persons (all seen it) 2. Not sure, just happened to notice out the corner of my eye. 3. UFO 4. UFO appeared to be heading West to East, then when spotted by four said individuals it abruptly changed direction to the SW staying just above and behind the tree line (acting as if it was hiding) and disappeared after traveling SW down the road. UFO was traveling too fast to be an airplane and was flying low, made absolutely no noise. 5. When first sighted, first observer (me) exclaimed "What is that?!" As soon as I said that everyone seen it immediately and could not associate it with any known objects. 6. Yes, after it went SW past the tree line.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Grayson
There were no other sightings in Grayson on or around September 20th 2013
Summary: Orange Ball w/ two amber colored exterior lights headed East, then when spotted turned abruptly to SE.
